title: EPAM | Senior Software Engineer A3 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: BE in Computer Science from tier 3 college
Years of Experience: 5
Prior Experience: CISCO 3 years + Infosys 2 years

Date of the Offer: 13 August 2024
Company: EPAM
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer A3
Location: Bengaluru

Salary: Rs 34L(Includes 96K employer PF and ~50K gratuty )
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 0
Bonus: No Bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 34L

Benefits: 15 paid vacation days + 6 paid sick leave days + 6 paid casual leaves + 10 paid Indian holidays and other EPAM standard benefits

Other details: Since this offer does not have any Stocks, yearly or signing bonus, and no relocation bonus as well, I have requested HR to include them. This is my first offer and they are ready to wait for my 60 days offer letter.

Please feel free to to share your thoughts if this offere is as per market standard
My tech stack: Java, Spring boot, microservices, REST API, AWS and docker

Will share interview experiance soon...
